title: A Sign of Affection, Vol. 2
description: Why must the time we spend together always be so short? Yuki's a hearing-impaired college student whose path crosses with Itsuomi, an upperclassman from her school. Against all expectations, Itsuomi doesn't bat an eye at her condition, treating her more normally than she's ever felt in her life, and she begins to fall in love with him. Resolving to be strong and face that love head-on, Yuki hopes to get to know him better... but that's easier said than done! Check out volume 2 of "A Sign of Affection," the manga that's taken the online and TV world by storm!
author: Suu Morishita
